name: Uber clone
tagline: Ride pick up mobile application for android. Similar to Uber. Implemented driver-side and passenger side of the application.
body: ### Welcome to Uber Android Application. Goal of the project was to create android application for users and drivers. Application successfully allows user to request a ride and allows drivers to pickup passengers/users. Google maps api, Parse Server on Amazon EC-2 for real time updates. ### Authors and Contributors You can contact Karma Pandya (@karmagamer) for this project. ### Support or Contact Most of my android projects rely on Parse server. I start my projects with Parse set up and I proceed to complete features according to my vision for the application. You can visit my website for data science and machine learning projects. Please send me feedback.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
